about_the_game:
Idle Kingdom
Idle Kingdom is an idle game inspired by old-school RPGs. It offers a wide variety of skills to enhance your character's growth and strength. From combat to gathering, Idle Kingdom has a bit of everything you could want. Train endlessly, defeat enemies, and collect their rare loot for yourself. You can also craft your own equipment and train various non-combat skills. Idle Kingdom is perfect for scratching that "number-go-up" itch.

Skills
Players can train a variety of skills, whether they choose to become a warrior, archer, or mage! If combat isn’t your style, you can focus on classic skills such as mining, woodcutting, fishing, cooking, smithing, artisanry, and more.

Upgrades
Visit the market to purchase upgrades that make your adventure easier and more enjoyable.

Enemies
Idle Kingdom features multiple areas filled with enemies to defeat. Explore them all to test your strength and claim rewards!
Minigames

We also offer a number of minigames for players to enjoy. These fun challenges provide a great way to earn extra rewards.
